abstract.t: This document describes an architecture for Pseudo Wire Emulation Edge-to-Edge (PWE3). It discusses the emulation of services (such as Frame Relay, ATM, Ethernet TDM and SONET/SDH) over packet switched networks (PSNs) using IP or MPLS. It presents the architectural framework for pseudo wires (PWs), defines terminology, specifies the various protocol elements and their functions.
